channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Research Note

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: 在 Pages 上浏览博客 https://ethannote.github.io/research_note/ 如何写博客 下面是创建并编辑博客的步骤 - 仅更新现有博客内容只需执行一次 1，每进行一次更新执行一次 3 - 若在 hugo 分支上进行了在线编辑，执行1、3 Clone git clone -b hugo https://github.com/EthanNote/research_note.git git clone -b master https://github.com/EthanNote/research_note.git public Create new blog: cd research_note hugo new post/new_blog.md Commit changes and push to github: git commit -a -m "update blog" git push origin hugo hugo cd .. mv public .public cp -r research_note/public . cp -r .public/.git public cd public git commit -a -m "update" git push origin master
